item.title: Hello World
item.description: The motivation to create this site was mainly to provide lecture scripts for my students, as well as a place where they can re-read stuff from my lessons or get additional theoretical input or practical examples. I prefer reading and structuring information like websites or wikis do, so I decided Iâ€™ll maintain and provide the information I can give in the same way instead manually handing out PDF scripts. You will find all that in german only for now under Unterricht.
